hadiths.text: Narrated Wathilah ibn al-Asqa': AbuSa'id said: I saw Wathilah ibn al-Asqa' in the mosque of Damascus. He spat at the mat and then rubbed it with his foot. He was asked: Why did you do so? He said: Because I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) doing so

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْبُزَاقِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Spitting In A Masjid Is Disliked
